text:
I visited the Hublot boutique in MBS and had a great experience. Very good selection of different models that i was able to try on. The friendly staff Ephraim helped did a great job of explaining us the different movements and size options etc.
Would definitely come back!

The experience of visiting Hublot MBS today was truly amazing!

Drake Tan was very patient in explaining the background and unique features of each watch. He has a strong and clear knowledge of each timepiece, which made me learn a lot about the Hublot brand. Thank you for your excellent service!

Truly an experience! The whole experience at the Hublot store was fantastic.
Bonnie gave me a great introduction to the Hublot brand and let me try on everything I wanted.
That's what a visit to a boutique is all about for me! Seeing something new and getting to know other brands. Away from online and towards personal advice, which Bonnie did exceptionally well.

I felt very comfortable and would be happy to come back.
Bonnie was extremely patient and helpful with attending to our enquiries, even offered to do some light cleaning for my Big Bang as we browsed!
Pretty good services, they welcomed me very happily and created a pleasant feeling for me!
